clusterList.phrase: although it is a cliche to which we are so familiar that we don't even notice it implies very interesting thoughts in the way it expresses some kind of deeply heartfelt desire doesn't it
beloved s plot is constructed to mirror the way that memories unfold
the plot emerges in nonlinear fragments as different characters remember their experiences and share them with the reader and or each other
and i've realized that this grief will always be a part of my story because like all seasons it has its time and place
